dialogs.patient: Recently, I am experiencing Lumbago and Fever
dialogs.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Twitch?
In that case, do you have any Rash?
No, I never had anything like that

dialogs.patient: Is it? Then do you experience Cough?
dialogs.doctor: Oh, do you have any Fear of cold?
I see. Do you have a family history of Asthma?
Is it? Then do you experience Chills?
